abstract: 12 rupees for a crunchy, spicy handful of heaven.
snippet: 12 rupees for a crunchy, spicy handful of heaven.
lead_paragraph: A recent reporting trip took me down the road that connects the pulsing metropolis of Mumbai to the laid-back retreat of Goa. About 80 kilometers (50 miles) outside the city, in the town of Vadkhal, my traveling companion insisted we make a snack stop. I am never really averse to snack stops, but I was surprised because he had been rhapsodizing about the fresh, Konkan-style fish curry that awaited us at our destination.

headline.main: The World's Best Vada Pav, Vadkhal Edition
